description: This source file defines an API router for a Tailored Content API endpoint using FastAPI. It exposes a GET endpoint '/content' that returns personalized content based on the user's package tier, which can be free, pro, or enterprise.

classes.name: TailoredContentResponse
classes.description: Response model containing tailored content data with different tiers.

classes.name: UserPublic
classes.description: User model that includes package tier information used for tailoring content.

classes.name: PackageTier
classes.description: Enumeration representing different user package tiers: free, pro, and enterprise.

methods.name: TailoredContentResponse get_content(user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: API endpoint function that returns tailored content based on the user's package tier.
